io.spine.client

Class TopicFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.client.TopicFactory

  • public final class TopicFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A factory of Topic instances.

    Uses the given ActorRequestFactory as the source of the topic meta information, such as the actor.

    See Also:
    ActorRequestFactory.topic()
